title: Back garden tidy and reshape
subtitle: A more finished feel with clean lines, cleared areas, and structure that’s easier to maintain.

seo.title: Back garden tidy and reshape
seo.description: A more finished feel with clean lines, cleared areas, and structure that’s easier to maintain.

hero.imageAlt: Well-kept back garden with trimmed hedges and a neat lawn

overview.label: Overview
paragraphs: This project focused on getting the space back under control and making it feel deliberate again—clear areas, cleaner lines, and a finish that looks properly cared for.
The result is a garden that looks better immediately and is easier to keep tidy going forward.

whatWeDid.label: What we did
bullets: Reshape edges for a more deliberate look
Reset structure so the space feels finished

gallery.imageAlt: Well-kept back garden with trimmed hedges and a neat lawn
gallery.caption: Reset and reshape for a cleaner outline.

gallery.imageAlt: Freshly maintained garden with trimmed hedges and neat lawn
gallery.caption: A more finished look from every angle.

gallery.imageAlt: Garden looking tidy and well kept
gallery.caption: A tidy look that’s easier to maintain.
